channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15609] Remove PB references from Result, DoubleColumnInterpreter and any such public facing class for 2.0
item.description: This is a sub-task for HBASE-15174.
item.summary: Remove PB references from Result, DoubleColumnInterpreter and any such public facing class for 2.0

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Patch for QA.
DoubleColumnInterpreter is marked public but BigDecimalInterpreter and LongInterpreter are marked private. So better to mark this also Private? ColumnInterpreter has APIs to convert to and from protos. So directly we cannot change DoubleColumnInterpreter not to work with protos.
Ya even the base class is Private marked..
Submitting for QA.
Reattaching for QA.

-1 overall

This message was automatically generated.

I think going forward if there are any protos exposed in public interfaces/methods though they are already marked IA.private - we can move them to IA.Private Util classes. That will help not to pollute the APIs with some internal Protos related arguments/return types.
There is one javadoc warning. I can correct it on commit. Will commit unless objections.
Ping for reviews !!
@stack, Anoop Sam John

Stack
Ping for reviews.

This seems to be a public method changed w/o the deprecation step from Result?

public RegionLoadStats getStats() {

How we justify this change?

Need to release note change in DoubleColumnInterpreter... Rather than Private, should it be changed to LimitedPrivate with allowed use from CPs? At least this class was marked evolving....

I was going to suggest the ProcedureState go into a procedure subpackage but I see we have ProcedureInfo at top level in hbase-common... so good where it is. Does ProcedureUtil need to be top-level too?

Otherwise the patch is great.

public RegionLoadStats getStats() {

Stack - The plan was to mark deprecated in branch-1 and 1.3 branches and in trunk just make the change.
Correct me if am missing something.

Need to release note change in DoubleColumnInterpreter... Rather than Private, should it be changed to LimitedPrivate with allowed use from CPs? At least this class was marked evolving....

Sure. Will change to LimitedPrivate but then ColumnInterpreters and all the subclass will change to LimitedPrivate?

Does ProcedureUtil need to be top-level too?

Will move it to procedure package but I think code in hbase-common cannot use something in hbase-server right? Let me check this once. If not I will leave it as is.
ProcedureUtil is getting used in ProcedureInfo. So it has to be in hbase-common only.
This patch is what I will commit. Will prepare a branch-1 patch for the deprecation.
Patch for branch-1
